net.danielmor.engine
Class InputManager

java.lang.Object
  net.danielmor.engine.InputManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class InputManager
extends Object
implements KeyListener

The InputManager manages input of key events. Events are mapped to GameActions.

Field Summary
static Cursor INVISIBLE_CURSOR
          An invisible cursor.
 
Constructor Summary
InputManager(Component comp)
          Creates a new InputManager that listens to input from thespecified component.

getMaps

public List getMaps(GameAction gameCode)
Gets a List of names of the keys and mouse actions mappedto this GameAction. Each entry in the List is a String.

mapToKey

public void mapToKey(GameAction gameAction,
                     int keyCode)
Maps a GameAction to a specific key. The key codes are defined in java.awt.KeyEvent. If the key already has a GameAction mapped to it, the new GameAction overwritesit.

resetAllGameActions

public void resetAllGameActions()
Resets all GameActions so they appear like they haven'tbeen pressed.

setCursor

public void setCursor(Cursor cursor)
Sets the cursor on this InputManager's input component.
